definition: to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter

sentences.english: They checked to see if she enrolled among the voters of their district.
sentences.chinese: 他们复核看看她是否被登记在他们区的选民名单中。

sentences.english: You had better countercheck that last estimate.
sentences.chinese: 你最好复核一下上次的估价。

sentences.english: Data handling procedures, calculation checks, OOS.
sentences.chinese: 数据处理程序，计算复核，OOS。

sentences.english: Voucher auditor signs on the correct payment request.
sentences.chinese: 凭证复核员在请款单上签字确认。

sentences.english: Now it is being asked to double-check that.
sentences.chinese: 现在，人们要求他们对这个问题进行复核。

sentences.english: Fourthly, to establish the detention inspecting system after arrest.
sentences.chinese: 四是建立逮捕以后的羁押审查复核制度。

sentences.english: If Yang Jia does not appeal, the case goes straight to the mandatory death penalty review procedure.
sentences.chinese: 如杨佳不上诉，只直接进入死刑复核程序。

sentences.english: The system should include, where appropriate, built-in checks of the correct entry and processing of data.
sentences.chinese: 系统应当包含数据的正确输入和处理的内部复核功能。

sentences.english: On such a base rechecking has been done one the compacted fill depth in the calculation of the original design.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，对原设计计算的压渗厚度进行了复核。

sentences.english: Let's make a check on his calculation.
sentences.chinese: 让我们复核一下他的计算结果。

sentences.english: And it is also the undeniable request that the second trial procedure and the re-check procedure of lif…
sentences.chinese: 二审程序与死刑复核程序分开是程序公正的必然要求。

definition: to review a judicial case/to reexamine
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
random inspection/to do a spot check
